title: (x) Wendy's current campaign font - Neutraface {Akira}
content:
Hi,  
I would really appreciate it if someone could please identify the type used in the current Wendyâ€™s campaigns. The query got emailed around the office, but no one knew what it was although a few people took an early lunch that day...

It caught my eye because it has a really pointy W but a slope and slightly calligraphic feel to some of the characters.

Thanks!  
FG

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091004032024im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fontID_burger_4744.jpg)
author: F Gordon
